DOC.brief_summary: Null hypothesis: No significant effect of vitamin C 500 mg Supplementation on the severity of micro-vascular complications of type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (DM). Alternative hypothesis: There is a significant effect of vitamin C 500mg supplementation on the severity of the micro-vascular complications of type 2DM.
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin C Supplementation Plus Hypoglycemic Agents Versus Hypoglycemic Agents Alone in Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: clinical diagnosis of type 2DM patients in good health receiving oral hypoglycemic drugs Insulin dependent diabetes receiving vitamin complex smoking renal disease liver disease
